metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12197 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
It was found that libpam4j up to and including 1.8 did not properly validate user accounts when authenticating. A user with a valid password for a disabled account would be able to bypass security restrictions and possibly access sensitive information.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam4j-java - 1.4-2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpam4j package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4-2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
